text: If anyone is considering using PDF vector assets for iOS there're a couple of things you should be aware of -> <http://bjango.com/articles/idontusepdfs/>

attachments.text: Makers of iStat Menus, Skala and other great Mac, iPad and iPhone apps.
attachments.fallback: Makers of iStat Menus, Skala and other great Mac, iPad and iPhone apps.

text: I know, Scott. With all the changes Apple is making and the introduction of the watch it wouldn't surprise me if they added some sort of vector support in the near future.
We should pick a day at some point and checkout SVGKit again - cut some sample assets up and try using them and then check compatibility/quality across devices
That assumes that the design team has an SVG workflow and desire to use them if it was an option.
